      public int countChar(String word, char letter)
      This method counts how many times a char (letter) appears in a String (word).
      Parameters:
      word - contains the email that the user has entered.
      letter - contains the character that is being counted in the word.
      Returns:

    • validEmail

      public boolean validEmail(String email)
      This method checks if the email has maximum 1 '@', a letter before the '@', and a dot after the '@'. It returns a boolean indicating if the email is valid or not.
      Parameters:
      email - contains the email the user has inputed.
      Returns:
      boolean that indicates if the email is valid or not.
